snippet: A. J. Allmendinger is set to return to Nascar and drive in two Nationwide Series races for Penske Racing.
abstract: A J Allmendinger, suspended for failed drug test in 2012, is set to return to Nascar and drive in two Nationwide Series races for Penske Racing; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: A. J. Allmendinger is set to return to Nascar and drive in two Nationwide Series races for Penske Racing.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
